summary.span: 工具集版本的聚合（例如

span.span: Aggregation of a toolset version (eg.

summary.span: “2.0”）、工具路径以及可选的关联属性集的聚合。

span.span: "2.0"), tools path, and optional set of associated properties.

summary.span: 工具集是不可变的。

span.span: Toolset is immutable.

summary.span: 创建一个具有给定的工具版本和工具路径的工具集。

span.span: Creates a toolset with the given tools version and tools path.

summary.span: 将从给定的项目集合中获取全局属性、保留属性和环境属性。

span.span: Global, reserved, and environment properties are taken from the given project collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public string DefaultSubToolsetVersion { get; }
.property instance string DefaultSubToolsetVersion
Public ReadOnly Property DefaultSubToolsetVersion As String
public: property System::String ^ DefaultSubToolsetVersion { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.DefaultSubToolsetVersion : string

summary.span: 返回此子工具集的默认子工具集版本。

span.span: Returns the default sub-toolset version for this sub-toolset.

summary.span: 所用启发式方法是：1) 如果安装了 Visual Studio 2010 且 ToolsVersion为“4.0”，则使用基本工具集，并返回子工具集版本“10.0”，以便将其设置为公开可见的属性，这样（例如）目标就可以使用它。

span.span: Heuristic used is: 1) If Visual Studio 2010 is installed and our ToolsVersion is "4.0", use the base toolset, and return a sub-toolset version of "10.0", to be set as a publicly visible property so that e.g. targets can consume it.

summary.span: 这是为了应对 Visual Studio 2010 没有任何子工具集的概念这一事实。

span.span: This is to handle the fact that Visual Studio 2010 did not have any concept of sub-toolsets.

summary.span: 2) 否则，请使用找到的版本最高的子工具集。

span.span: 2) Otherwise, use the highest-versioned sub-toolset found.

summary.span: 带有编号版本的子工具集将按数值顺序排列；任何其他子工具集将按找到的顺序预先置于列表的开头部分。

span.span: Sub-toolsets with numbered versions will be ordered numerically; any additional sub-toolsets will be prepended to the beginning of the list in the order found.

summary.span: 使用版本最高的子工具集，因为在没有任何其他信息的情况下，我们假定版本更高的工具将更有可能生成更正确的信息。

span.span: We use the highest-versioned sub-toolset because, in the absence of any other information, we assume that higher-versioned tools will be more likely to be able to generate something more correct.

summary.span: 如果没有可用的子工具集（并且未安装 Dev10），则将返回 Null。

span.span: Will return null if there is no sub-toolset available (and Dev10 is not installed).
The default sub toolset version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] 安装了，则使用基本工具集并返回 "10.0" 的子工具集版本。If [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] is installed, use the base toolset and return a sub toolset version of "10.0". 否则，请使用找到的最高版本的子工具集。Otherwise, use the highest-versioned sub toolset found. 具有编号版本的子工具集按数值顺序排列;任何其他子工具集都按找到的顺序预置到列表的开头。Sub toolsets with numbered versions are ordered numerically; any additional sub toolsets are prepended to the beginning of the list in the order found. 如果没有可用的子工具集且未安装，则返回 null [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] 。Returns null if there is no sub toolset available and [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] is not installed.

summary.span: 创建将与此工具集一起使用的子工具集版本。

span.span: Creates the sub toolset version to be used with this toolset.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GenerateSubToolsetVersion ();
.method public hidebysig instance string GenerateSubToolsetVersion() cil managed
Public Function GenerateSubToolsetVersion () As String
public: System::String ^ GenerateSubToolsetVersion();
member this.GenerateSubToolsetVersion : unit -> string

summary.span: 生成将与此工具集一起使用的子工具集版本。

span.span: Generates the sub-toolset version to be used with this toolset.

summary.span: 子工具集版本基于：1。

span.span: Sub-toolset version is based on: 1.

summary.span: 如果将“VisualStudioVersion”设置为工具集自身上的属性（全局或环境），请使用该属性。

span.span: If "VisualStudioVersion" is set as a property on the toolset itself (global or environment), use that.

summary.span: 否则，请使用此工具集的默认子工具集版本。

span.span: Otherwise, use the default sub-toolset version for this toolset.

summary.span: 返回的子工具集版本可能为 Null；如果是这样，则意味着不应使用任何子工具集，而只能使用基本工具集。

span.span: The sub-toolset version returned may be null; if so, that means that no sub-toolset should be used, just the base toolset on its own.

summary.span: 返回的子工具集版本可能无法映射到现有的子工具集。

span.span: The sub-toolset version returned may not map to an existing sub-toolset.

returns.span: 将与此工具集一起使用的子工具集版本。

span.span: The sub toolset version to be used with this toolset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 "VisualStudioVersion" 设置为工具集自身上的属性，则子工具集版本设置为 "VisualStudioVersion"。If "VisualStudioVersion" is set as a property on the toolset itself, then sub toolset version is set to "VisualStudioVersion". 否则，子工具集版本设置为工具集的 DefaultSubToolsetVersion。Otherwise, sub toolset version is set to the DefaultSubToolsetVersion of the toolset.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GenerateSubToolsetVersion (System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,string> overrideGlobalProperties, int solutionVersion);
.method public hidebysig instance string GenerateSubToolsetVersion(class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, string> overrideGlobalProperties, int32 solutionVersion) cil managed
Public Function GenerateSubToolsetVersion (overrideGlobalProperties As IDictionary(Of String, String), solutionVersion As Integer) As String
public: System::String ^ GenerateSubToolsetVersion(System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ overrideGlobalProperties, int solutionVersion);
member this.GenerateSubToolsetVersion : System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, string> * int -> string

param.name: overrideGlobalProperties
param.span: 设置全局属性以用以创建子工具集版本。

span.span: Set of global properties to use to create the sub toolset version.

param.span: 可能为 null。

span.span: May be null.

param.name: solutionVersion
param.span: 使用创建子工具集版本的解决方案版本。

span.span: The solution version to use to create the sub toolset version.

summary.span: 生成将与此工具集一起使用的子工具集版本。

span.span: Generates the sub-toolset version to be used with this toolset.

summary.span: 子工具集版本基于：1。

span.span: Sub-toolset version is based on: 1.

summary.span: 如果传递给我们的属性集中存在“VisualStudioVersion”全局属性，请使该属性。

span.span: If the "VisualStudioVersion" global property exists in the set of properties passed to us, use it.

summary.span: 否则，如果将“VisualStudioVersion”设置为工具集自身上的属性（全局或环境），请使用该属性。

span.span: Otherwise, if "VisualStudioVersion" is set as a property on the toolset itself (global or environment), use that.

summary.span: 否则，如果解决方案文件中的 Visual Studio 版本映射到现有的子工具集，则使用该版本。

span.span: Otherwise, use Visual Studio version from solution file if it maps to an existing sub-toolset.

summary.span: 否则，请使用此工具集的默认子工具集版本。

span.span: Otherwise, use the default sub-toolset version for this toolset.

summary.span: 返回的子工具集版本可能为 Null；如果是这样，则意味着不应使用任何子工具集，而只能使用基本工具集。

span.span: The sub-toolset version returned may be null; if so, that means that no sub-toolset should be used, just the base toolset on its own.

summary.span: 返回的子工具集版本可能无法映射到现有的子工具集。

span.span: The sub-toolset version returned may not map to an existing sub-toolset.

summary.span: 全局属性字典可以为 Null。

span.span: The global properties dictionary may be null.
The sub toolset version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果传入的全局属性集中存在 "VisualStudioVersion" 全局属性，则子工具集版本设置为 "VisualStudioVersion"。If the "VisualStudioVersion" global property exists in the set of global properties passed in, then sub toolset version is set to "VisualStudioVersion". 否则，如果将 "VisualStudioVersion" 设置为工具集自身上的属性，则子工具集版本设置为 "VisualStudioVersion"。Otherwise, if "VisualStudioVersion" is set as a property on the toolset itself, then sub toolset version is set to "VisualStudioVersion". 否则，如果对应于解决方案版本的 Visual Studio 版本 (Visual Studio version = 解决方案版本-1) 传入映射到现有的子工具集，则子工具集版本将设置为 Visual Studio 版本。Otherwise, if the Visual Studio version corresponding to the solution version (Visual Studio version = solution version - 1) passed in maps to an existing sub toolset, then sub toolset version is set to the Visual Studio version. 否则，子工具集版本设置为工具集的 DefaultSubToolsetVersion。Otherwise, sub toolset version is set to the DefaultSubToolsetVersion of the toolset.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Build.Execution.ProjectPropertyInstance GetProperty (string propertyName, string subToolsetVersion);

param.span: 可为 。

span.span: May be .

summary.span: 如果给定了属性名和子工具集版本，先在子工具集中搜索该属性，然后在必要时退回到基本工具集，并在找到该属性时返回该属性。

span.span: Given a property name and a sub-toolset version, searches for that property first in the sub-toolset, then falls back to the base toolset if necessary, and returns the property if it was found.

returns.span: 所指定的属性，或如果找不到，则为 。

span.span: The property specified, or if not found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在子工具集中找不到该属性，则在基本工具集中搜索该属性。If the property is not found in the sub toolset, searches for the property in the base toolset. 如果在子工具集或基工具集中找不到该属性，则返回 null。If the property is not found in the sub toolset or the base toolset, returns null.
